question: Where will the makeathon be held?
answer: Our second annual Makeathon will be held in-person at the Driftmier Engineering Center, 597 DW Brooks Drive Athens, GA, 30602!

question: How much will the event cost?
answer: Nothing! The Makeathon is completely free for the first 300 applicants!

question: Can I start working on my project before the event?
answer: No. You can think about possible approaches, but you aren't allowed to make anything before the event.

question: What if I don't have a team or idea?
answer: It's perfectly OK! The Makeathon is a perfect opportunity to make friends and learn new concepts.

question: What are the rules all attendees must abide by?
answer: There are no special rules in place, just make sure treat each other well.

question: How many people can I have on my team?
answer: You can have up to 4 members.

question: Who do I reach out to if I have more questions?
answer: You can reach out to hello@ugahacks.com!
